description: This file defines asynchronous FastAPI route handlers for managing chat responses, file processing, and workflow execution within a backend API. It includes functions for streaming chat responses from agents and teams, processing uploaded files (images, audio, video, documents), and dynamically creating API routes for different agent, team, or workflow instances.

methods.name: agent_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that streams chat responses from an agent, yielding JSON-serialized chunks or error events.

methods.name: team_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that streams chat responses from a team, yielding JSON-serialized chunks or error events.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter with endpoints for status checks and executing chat workflows, handling file uploads, and streaming responses for agents, teams, or workflows.
